confirmDialog.description: A new draft e-service will be created with the same characteristics as the selected e-service

createVersionDraft.loading: We are creating the new version (as draft)

outcome.success: The new version of the e-service is available as a draft

updateVersionDraft.loading: We are updating the new version (as draft)

publishVersionDraft.loading: We are publishing the draft version

outcome.success: The new version of the e-service was successfully published
outcome.error: It was not possible to publish the new version of the e-service. Please check that the interface document has been uploaded and try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm draft publication
confirmDialog.description: Once published, a version of the e-service can no longer be deleted and becomes available in the e-service catalog. It can still be suspended or deprecated when a new version becomes available.

publishDelegatedVersionDraft.loading: We are forwarding the version to the delegator

outcome.success: The version was forwarded to the delegator for publication approval
outcome.error: It was not possible to forward the version to the delegator for approval. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Request version publication
confirmDialog.description: You are about to forward to {{delegatorName}} the request to publish a new version of the e-service {{eserviceName}}.

outcome.success: The purpose was successfully saved

outcome.success: The purpose was successfully updated

outcome.success: The purpose was successfully deleted
outcome.error: It was not possible to delete the purpose. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this version of the e-service will be suspended. No consumer will be able to access this version until it is reactivated

outcome.success: The e-service version was reactivated

confirmDialog.title: Confirm version reactivation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this version of the e-service will be reactivated. All consumers with an active service request for this e-service version will be able to use it again

outcome.success: The requested information was successfully updated
outcome.error: It was not possible to update the requested information. Please, try again!

createDraft.loading: We are creating the service request draft

outcome.error: It was not possible to create the request. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Creation of service request draft
confirmDialog.description: Do you want to create a service request draft for the e-service {{name}}, version {{version}}

submitDraft.loading: We are forwarding the service request

outcome.success: The request was successfully forwarded. You will receive update notifications about its status
outcome.error: It was not possible to forward the request. If you believe you are entitled, contact support for further checks

description.default: By clicking "confirm", the service request will be forwarded to the e-service producer for approval
description.isDelegated: By clicking "confirm", the service request will be forwarded to the e-service producer for approval and a notification will be sent to the delegating party for information.

submitToOwnEService.loading: We are activating the service request

outcome.success: The request was successfully activated
outcome.error: It was not possible to activate the request. Please, try again

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request activation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the service request will be activated. Your party is the producer of this e-service, so no attribute verification or approval is required

outcome.success: The draft request was successfully deleted
outcome.error: It was not possible to delete the request. Please, try again

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the service request will be deleted. You can always create a new one

outcome.success: The draft was successfully updated

outcome.success: The document was successfully deleted
outcome.error: It was not possible to delete the document. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The service request is now active, and purposes can be created to associate with the e-service
outcome.error: It was not possible to activate the request. Please ensure all attributes have been verified and try again

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request activation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the service request will be activated. It can be suspended at any time from this panel

outcome.error: It was not possible to reject the request. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The service request was successfully suspended. The consumer's clients can no longer access the producing service
outcome.error: It was not possible to suspend the request. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request suspension
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the service request will be suspended. Clients linked to this request will no longer have access to the producing e-service. The request can be reactivated at any time from this same page

outcome.success: The service request was successfully archived
outcome.error: It was not possible to archive the request. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request archiving
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the service request will be archived. This action is irreversible. Clients linked to this request will no longer have access to the producing e-service. You can always create new service requests for this e-service

outcome.success: The service request was updated to the latest version of the e-service
outcome.error: It was not possible to update the request. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The service request was successfully cloned and is available as a draft
outcome.error: It was not possible to clone the service request. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm service request cloning
confirmDialog.description: A new draft service request will be created with the same characteristics as the selected request. Remember to integrate the documentation with what is required by the producer before submitting it again

confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm" this purpose will be deleted and will no longer be recoverable. All clients associated with it will no longer be able to access the producer's e-service. You can always create new purposes

outcome.success: The number of daily calls was successfully updated.
outcome.error: It was not possible to update the number of calls. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The purpose was suspended. Clients associated with the purpose can no longer access the producing service

confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm" this purpose will be suspended. All associated clients will no longer have access to the produced e-service until it is reactivated

outcome.success: The purpose is now published. Attention: if the number of calls exceeds the limit set by the producer, their approval will be required to handle that load
outcome.error: It was not possible to reactivate the purpose. Please, try again! If this is the first activation, make sure all required fields for the purpose are filled in

confirmDialog.title: Confirm purpose activation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm" this purpose will be activated. All clients associated by the consumer will have access to the producer's e-service with the set number of calls

outcome.success: The purpose has now been archived because it is no longer in use. You can always create new purposes
outcome.error: It was not possible to archive the purpose. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm purpose archiving
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm" this purpose will be archived. All associated clients will no longer have access to the produced e-service

deleteVersion.loading: We are deleting the call number update

confirmDialog.title: Confirm update deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this update to the number of calls to the producer's e-service will be deleted. You can continue to use this purpose with the current call number

confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm" the public key related to this operator will be deleted. NB: all services using this key will no longer be able to access the producer's service. If you are not sure, download and save your public key before deleting it
